params.team: address of team whose turn was taken

game_winner.details: Set to 0x0000~ while game is active. game is over when winner is set

GameCreated(address,address).notice: This will be used to track which addresses are parcipating

TeamReady(address).notice: This event will only event fire twice per contract, when 2 events have been fired game can begin

TurnFinished(address,bytes4,bool).notice: This will keep history of moves takenThis should filtered and used by front-end to update hit/misses

setTeamOnePieces(bytes4[15]).notice: Sets locations for team 1 shipsTeam 1 Only | Team Pieces not already set

setTeamTwoPieces(bytes4[15]).notice: Sets locations for team 2 shipsTeam 2 Only | Team Pieces not already set
